QuestData.Title: Totemic Restoration
QuestData.Description: I am fed and my body is prepared. I can now be instilled with my power of old and for a time will be immune to their blood curses and leeching powers.$b$bUse the magic of the glowflies to channel my power from the totems into me. Soon you will see me restored. Then we will destroy the army that prepares across the river to take all that is mine by force.
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the power of the totems and restore Krag'wa.
